channel.title: Helmet2Helmet.net Weekly Sports Show
channel.description: Listen in as Tony Nation and Andrew Halverson break down the upcoming weeks games around the league. They'll give you key insight, detailed analysis and tips to become the fantasy guru and get more out of your Sunday's. And then, after all the games, they'll bring you the recap show, looking back on the weekend's action, analyzing scores, news tidbits about the game, milestones, records, and any note-worthy nugget.

item.title: Helmet2Helmet.net's Sports Show
item.description: Listen in as Tony Nation and Andrew Halverson discuss happenings in professional and collegent sports this week.

item.title: Helmet2Helmet.net's Probowl Recap Show
item.description: Listen in as Tony Nation and Andrew Halverson discuss The ProBowl, basketball, and much more.

item.title: Helmet2Helmet.net's SuperBowl Recap Show
item.description: Listen in as Tony Nation and Andrew Halverson discuss The SuperBowl, basketball, and much more.

item.title: Helmet2Helmet.net's SuperBowl Show
item.description: Listen in as Tony Nation and Andrew Halverson discuss The SuperBowl, coaching carousel, and ncaa basketball, plus much much more.

item.title: Helmet2Helmet.net's Conference Championship Show
item.description: Listen in as Tony Nation and Andrew Halverson discuss Conference Championship games in the NFL.

item.title: Helmet2Helmet.net's Divisional Playoff Review
item.description: Listen in as Tony Nation and Andrew Halverson Review the Divisional Playoffs in the NFL.

item.title: Helmet2Helmet.net's Divisional Playoff Preview
item.description: Listen in as Tony Nation and Andrew Halverson preview the Divisional Playoffs in the NFL.

item.title: Helmet2Helmet.net's Wildcard weekend review
item.description: Listen in as Tony Nation reviews Wildcard weekend in the NFL.

item.title: Helmet2Helmet.net's Playoff preview and Yearly Awards
item.description: Listen in as Tony Nation and Andrew Halverson preview the NFL Playoffs and hand out thier Yearly Awards.

item.title: Helmet2Helmet.net's Week 9 NFL Preview Show
item.description: Listen in as Tony Nation and Andrew Halverson preview the week 9 games around the league. Also, don't miss Vilma51's fantasy segment that'll include all of your fantasy options, starts, sits, matchups, and insights to get the most out of your team, and increasing your chances to win.

item.title: Helmet2Helmet.net's Week 8 NFL Recap Show
item.description: Listen in as Tony Nation and Andrew Halverson break down Week 8 in the NFL. They'll recap all the games that went down, including scores to stats, heroes to goats, and everything in-between. And coming at you is Vilma51 with all of your fantasy options, starts, sits, matchups, and insights to get the most out of your team, and increasing your chances to win.

item.title: Helmet2Helmet.net's Week 4 NFL Preview Show
item.description: Join Tony Nation, and Tony alone, as he goes around the league and previews all the Week 4 action around the NFL.
